introduction.content: From the very first session, it was clear that Maya didn't need more advice — she needed space. Space to slow down, to breathe, and to feel without the pressure of being "productive" all the time.

fullWidthQuote.quote: I used to think therapy was about fixing what's wrong. But this was different. It felt more like coming home to myself — quietly, slowly, and with a lot more kindness than I expected.
